title: I Remember
lyrics:
Nal bujeonghaessdeon chingudeul gieog-ina
Yeonlag geobuhaessdeon chingudeul gieog-i nane
Bujoghamman chassdeon naldeul da gieog-ina
Nakksisdae deulgo tteonan naega gieog-i nane
Silpael balaessdeon aedeul-ege yeonlag-i wa
Bring Bring maenijeohante da dollyeobonae

I don’t got no time for you haters now

Malhalge iss-eum TV teulgo hanbeon malhaeboge



Sigan-i bujoghae 24siloneun hal il-eul da moshae

Bangsong-gug deul-yeossda weiteu deul-eossda nakksisjul pul-eossda Hit

Bareseo yeon-aesangdamhago sonnim-eul mosiji sohuiwa chinjeolhage

Aelbeom-eul mandeulgo bigmamahotago wandohang ap-eseo chulhang-eul hae

Yeneung wolcheog ibjil wassne sicheonglyul nakkgo daemuldo nakkne

Hibhab-ui Culture issjil anhne mudae wieseoneun Artistdabge

TVsog-eseoneun sunsuhan magnae ttangbadag-eseo ollawassne

Gud-i naega wae hangilman taeghae nae poten-eun kkeutttawin eobsneunde

Bon-eob-eun eum-ag-in, chwimineun yeneung-in, bogien yeon-yein, yah

Covering magazines, isyuneun maewolppun anin nae ilsang-e salm-iji, yah

Geungjeong-ui eneoji, Stoner Tunes, Microdot kemiga jiliji uliga haenaessji

Magnaega kelijil, geumbaesji tanaessji naui salm-eun neoui Fantasy



Nal bujeonghaessdeon chingudeul gieog-ina

Yeonlag geobuhaessdeon chingudeul gieog-i nane

Bujoghamman chassdeon naldeul da gieog-ina

Nakksisdae deulgo tteonan naega gieog-i nane

Silpael balaessdeon aedeul-ege yeonlag-i wa

Bring Bring maenijeohante da dollyeobonae

I don’t got no time for you haters now

Malhalge iss-eum TV teulgo hanbeon malhaeboge



“injidoleul jom deo kiwoseo dasi mul-eoboge”

“jogeumman deo yumyeonghaejimyeon dasi hanbeon deo gominhaejulge”

“sigiga an majdeonga modeungeol tteonaseo neon ajig jjam-i andwae”

1 1 mudaeleul haedallaneun jogeon-e seob-oedeul da gieog-i nane

Ay, If you are not my family, you are my enemy, bruh

Butag-eulo sijagdoeneun munjana jeonhwadeun ilg-geona badjil anhna

If you ain’t talkin’ about dollars, it don’t make no Damn sense

Naui keolieoen bisijeun ttawin jonjaehaji anhne, uh

Jeong-geul-e sijaghae nakksisdae deulgoseon hwidullyeossji

Myeoch myeong-eun geungjeong-e maesijil namgigo myeoch myeong-eun bius-eossji

Ha! ha! ha! ha! ijen nae yeopjalil bomyeon gyeong-gyuhyeong-gwa deoghwa hyeongnim

Yeneung-ui Prince, eum-ag-ui sin, jaehoneun! No one can rock with my team



Nal bujeonghaessdeon chingudeul gieog-ina

Yeonlag geobuhaessdeon chingudeul gieog-i nane

Bujoghamman chassdeon naldeul da gieog-ina

Nakksisdae deulgo tteonan naega gieog-i nane

Silpael balaessdeon aedeul-ege yeonlag-i wa

Bring Bring maenijeohante da dollyeobonae

I don’t got no time for you haters now

Malhalge iss-eum TV teulgo hanbeon malhaeboge
